content: this legal document provides an update on a legal case involving two parties referred to as mr mma and mr mmo the document outlines the details of two apartments and a garage located in castelfidardo these properties are divided into two shares with each party being assigned one share the value of each share is specified as euro 78000 the document also includes important information such as cadastral data and registration numbers of the properties it is signed by a notary dr mb and all parties involved
